name: automad
description: Automad is a flat-file content management system that doesn’t require a database. It’s fast, easy to use, and features a template system and web-based admin panel for building websites.
features: Flat-File CMS: No database required for simple deployment. Easy hosting.
Fast Performance: Lightweight architecture ensures quick loading. Speed optimized.
Template System: Flexible theming and customization. Beautiful sites.
Web Admin Panel: Manage content through browser interface. No FTP needed.
Markdown Support: Write content in markdown format. Simple authoring.
Easy Setup: Quick installation with minimal configuration. Start quickly.
Version Control Friendly: Text-based storage works with Git. Developer-friendly.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your website. Data ownership.
